mapper.update:
/* 특정회원 수정 */ UPDATE member
mem_level_code=#{mem_level_code},
member_pw=#{memberPw},
member_email=#{memberEmail},
member_name=#{memberName},
member_birth=#{memberBirth},
member_gender=#{memberGender},
member_phone=#{memberPhone},
member_addr=#{memberAddr},
member_addr_detail=#{member_addr_detail},
member_regdate=CURDATE(),
final_mileage= 0 ,
accumulated_payment_amount= 0,
memberState= '정상회원',
WHERE member_id=#{memberId};
mapper.select: /* 특정회원 조회 */ SELECT member_id, mem_level_code, member_pw, member_email, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_addr_detail, member_regdate, final_mileage, accumulated_payment_amount, memberState FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId};
/* 회원아이디 중복체크 */ SELECT COUNT(m.member_id) FROM member AS m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId};

/* 특정회원 조회 */ SELECT m.member_id, m.member_pw, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_birth, m.member_gender, m.member_phone, CONCAT(member_addr," ",member_addr_detail) as member_addr, m.member_regdate, m.final_mileage FROM member AS m
${searchKey} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, mem_level_code, member_pw, member_email, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_addr, member_addr_detail, member_regdate, final_mileage, accumulated_payment_amount, memberState) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{mem_level_code}, #{memberPw}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddr}, #{member_addr_detail}, NOW(), 0, 0,'정상회원');
mapper.select: /* 회원목록 조회 */ SELECT m.member_id, m.member_pw, m.member_name, member_email, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, CONCAT(member_addr," ",member_addr_detail) as member_addr, member_regdate, final_mileage FROM member AS m
